ANS_2: There are many stab wounds on the father/s body; the killer must have deep hatred for this man.
ANS_3: There was a bloody cloth stuck on the bookshelf. He gripped the knife there, then stabbed himself in the back of his back, then tossed the knife close to his father/s body and fabricated it by someone else.
ANS_4: There was a flash of light from the fish tank when the sun accidentally hit; the diamonds must have been hidden in it.
HINT_4: A flash of light from the fish tank
